text: Captain Fantastic and the Brown Dirt Cowboy is the ninth studio album by Elton John and was released on 23 May 1975. It topped the album charts in Australia, Canada, New Zealand and the United States and made the top 10 in Austria, Finland, Norway, Spain and the United Kingdom. It was nominated for two Grammy Awards in 1976. == Track listing == All songs written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin, except where noted. Note: On the original DJM Records CD version, "We All Fall in Love Sometimes" and "Curtains" are both combined into one track, making it a nine-track album. On all other CD versions (MCA Records, Polydor and French label Carrere Records), the two tracks are separated. === Bonus tracks (1995 Mercury and 1996 Rocket reissue) === === 30th Anniversary Deluxe Edition === == References == Category:1975 albums Category:Elton John albums
title: Captain Fantastic and the Brown Dirt Cowboy
